# Playing with matrices in R

## Problem 1

```{r}
matrix_a <- matrix(c(2, 0, 9, 4, -2, 0, -3, 5, 6), nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)
matrix_b <- matrix(c(8, -7, -3, 6, 9, 5, -2, -5, 1), nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)
```

```{r}
print(matrix_a + matrix_b)

print(4 * matrix_a + 3 * matrix_b)

print(t(matrix_a))

print(solve(matrix_a))

print(det(matrix_a))
print(det(t(matrix_a)))
```
